title: Why do my replies sometimes nest under the comment I am replying too, and sometimes not?
body: Sometimes on these boards my replies properly nest under the comment I a replying too, other times they just jump to the end of the thread as a unique comment. What am I doing wrong that it isn't always doing either one or the other?

replies.body: Depends on the view you have set!  Under "DISCUSS" there is an option to switch between "chronological" and "discussion" view.  Discussion will nest replies under the original comment when directed to it.
Oh my God I didn't even realize. Thank you!
